Title: Somewhere
Original title: Somewhere
Country: USA
USA release: 22/12/2010
Released in Spain: 30/09/2011
Studio: Focus Features
Director: Sofia Coppola
Screenplay: Sofia Coppola
Starring: Stephen Dorff, Elle Fanning, Benicio Del Toro, Michelle Monaghan, Laura Ramsey, Robert Schwartzman, Caitlin Keats, Chris Pontius


Synopsis:
Johnny Marco is a major actor with bad-boy profile, facing a life of excess. Live at the legendary Chateau Marmont hotel in Hollywood, rides in his Ferrari and his days were a haze of alcohol, women and fans. Tucked away in this celebrity induced an artificial world, Johnny has lost all sense of his true self. Until one day, her 11 year old daughter, Cleo (Elle Fanning), from his failed marriage, unexpectedly arrive at the hotel and it becomes an anchor to reality. Their meetings are to be faced with the question of where in your life and the question everyone must face: What path will take it?

Production notes:
- The screenwriter and director Sofia Coppola returns to work with the production company that filmed the Academy Award-winning "Lost in Translation '.
